Sentencas: Bulky volume limits the application of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems in some scenarios.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: In this paper, a compact integrated reactor with combustor and air pre-heater is proposed.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: It is adapted by coating combustion catalyst to the hot-side of a plate-fin heat exchanger.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: The fundamental steady/transient characteristics of the reactor are investigated at different inlet settings in the warmup condition of a metal-supported SOFC.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Results show that the reactor has a balanced combustion performance with a minimum methane conversion rate of 85.1%, while it can be effectively improved by reducing the excess air ratio.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: The reactor has better heat exchange capability than the traditional series arrangement of independent combustor and air pre-heater.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: There is about 68.7% of the reaction heat extracted by direct metal-substrate conduction and this dominates the heat exchange process.

Sentencas: The reactor also has a good transient response.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Methane conversion can be stable within 12.5 min; meanwhile, the output air temperature shows a good capability to track the development of stack temperature.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Both the air temperature rise rate around 35 C min-1 and the rise trend of first fast and then slow can meet the requirements of stack quick warmup.
Titulo: Fundamental characteristics of an integrated reactor with catalytic combustor and air pre-heater for compact solid oxide fuel cell systems

Sentencas: Overall, the methane conversion development within the reactor and the temperature rise of the stack reinforce mutually, and both can stabilize more quickly in this case.
